name: Flash Hiders
description:
Flash Hiders (Japanese: フラッシュハイダース) is a fighting video game developed and published in Japan in 1993 for the PC Engine Super CD-ROM console.

Flash Hiders was followed by a 1995 sequel titled Battle Tycoon: Flash Hiders SFX, which was also released exclusively in Japan, but developed for the Super Famicom.
